/*
This is the 0.0.2 version of the Presidents game, as created by Will 
Jasen.  So far, I have emulated a shuffled deck by creating an array 
and randomizing everything with the array, though I could go back and 
redo the array to make it 52 instead of 53.  Gameover is determined 
with a while test.  I'm also very close to finishing up player one's 
controls, after which, I'll create the rest of the CPU players and 
finish up the gameplay.  After I've finished that, I will go back and 
debug the game so no one can exploit a cheat.
*/
#include <ctime>
#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    srand(time(NULL));
    system("cls");
    
    char deck[53];
    char card=50; int r; int temp; int i; int z=0;
    
    int turn=(rand()%3+1);  //choose who goes first
    char cardtype; //type of card played
    int cardnum; //number of card played
    int cardvalue; //value of card so you can't go down
    int gameover=0; //gameover value
    int cardsinplay; //type of card in play
    int newround=1; //when to start a new round, default is to start
    int cardnuminhand=0; //delete cards from hand
    
    //fill deck with all the card values
    for(i=1; i<33; i++)
    {
        deck[i]=card;
        if(i%4==0)
        card++;
    }
    for(i=33; i<37; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='T';
    }
    for(i=37; i<41; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='J';
    }        
    for(i=41; i<45; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='Q';
    }
    for(i=45; i<49; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='K';
    }  
    for(i=49; i<53; i++)
    {
        deck[i]='A';
    }
    // fill deck[0] with a space
    deck[0]='0';
    //shuffle deck    
    for(i=1; i<53; i++)
    {
        r=(rand()%52)+1;
        temp=deck[i]; deck[i]=deck[r]; deck[r]=temp; 
    }
    z=0;
    
    //first player go
    while(gameover!=1)
    {
    
    switch(turn)
    {
        case 1: {
                    //display player's hand
                    cout << "Your hand:   ";
                    for(z=1; z<14; z++)
                      {
                        cout << " ";
                        switch(deck[z])
                          {
                            case '0': cout << " "; break;
                            case '3': cout << "3"; break;
                            case '4': cout << "4"; break;
                            case '5': cout << "5"; break;
                            case '6': cout << "6"; break;
                            case '7': cout << "7"; break;
                            case '8': cout << "8"; break;
                            case '9': cout << "9"; break;
                            case 'T': cout << "T"; break;
                            case 'J': cout << "J"; break;
                            case 'Q': cout << "Q"; break;
                            case 'K': cout << "K"; break;
                            case 'A': cout << "A"; break;
                            case '2': cout << "2"; break;
                          }
                      }
                cout << "\n\n";
                cout << "Which card will you play?  ";
                cin >> cardtype;
                cout << "How many of this card?  ";
                cin >> cardnum;
                //check for card value and number
                for(i=1; i<14; i++)
                {
                    if(deck[i]==cardtype)
                    {
                        cardnuminhand++;
                        if(cardnuminhand==cardnum)
                        break;
                    }
                }
                
                if(cardtype=='3')
                cardvalue=1;
                if(cardtype=='4')
                cardvalue=2;
                if(cardtype=='5')
                cardvalue=3;
                if(cardtype=='6')
                cardvalue=4;
                if(cardtype=='7')
                cardvalue=5;
                if(cardtype=='8')
                cardvalue=6;
                if(cardtype=='9')
                cardvalue=7;
                if(cardtype=='T')
                cardvalue=8;
                if(cardtype=='J')
                cardvalue=9;
                if(cardtype=='Q')
                cardvalue=10;
                if(cardtype=='K')
                cardvalue=11;
                if(cardtype=='A')
                cardvalue=12;
                if(cardtype=='2')
                cardvalue=13;
                
                if(newround==1)
                {
                    cardsinplay=cardnum;
                    newround--;
                }    
                for(i=1; i<14; i++)
                {
                    if(cardnum!=0)
                    {
                        if(deck[i]==cardtype)
                          {
                            deck[i]='0';
                            --cardnum;
                          }
                    }                
                }    
                turn++;
                break;
                }    
        case 2: //cpu deck[14-26]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardsinplay=cardnum;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    system("cls");
                    cout << "Player two's go\n\n";
                    turn++;
                    break;
                }  
        case 3: //cpu deck[27-39]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardsinplay=cardnum;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    cout << "Player three's go\n\n";
                    turn++;
                    break;
                }  
        case 4: //cpu deck[40-52]
                {
                    if(newround==1)
                    {
                        cardsinplay=cardnum;
                        newround--;
                    }
                    cout << "Player four's go\n\n";
                    turn=1;
                    break;
                }
    }
}        
    
    return 0;
}

/*
*/
